QuestData.Title: An Ancient Secret
QuestData.Description: Before Mayla may be pronounced High Chieftain, there is one more vision she must see. I wish to show you as well.$b$bIt is an ancient secret, handed down along the Highmountain bloodline. I ask for your discretion in keeping it that way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Spiritwalker Ebonhorn in Neltharion's Vault.
QuestData.RewardText: That day, the hammer freed me of the corruption of the Black Dragonflight.$b$bIn gratitude, I have faithfully served the Highmountain family since Huln rescued me from this pit.$b$bIt has been my honor and my pleasure to watch each of his descendants earn the title of High Chieftain.
